a:12:{s:3:"key";s:19:"field_53cd61add5ca0";s:5:"label";s:19:"Helper Instructions";s:4:"name";s:23:"acf_helper_instructions";s:4:"type";s:16:"flexible_content";s:12:"instructions";s:0:"";s:8:"required";s:1:"0";s:7:"layouts";a:1:{i:0;a:6:{s:5:"label";s:17:"Instruction Entry";s:4:"name";s:17:"instruction_entry";s:7:"display";s:3:"row";s:3:"min";s:0:"";s:3:"max";s:0:"";s:10:"sub_fields";a:4:{i:0;a:12:{s:3:"key";s:19:"field_53ce813a634ff";s:5:"label";s:11:"Instruction";s:4:"name";s:11:"instruction";s:4:"type";s:7:"wysiwyg";s:12:"instructions";s:119:"

The instruction you type here can be inserted into an ACF using the two fields below.

Test Instruction One

";s:8:"required";s:1:"0";s:12:"column_width";s:0:"";s:13:"default_value";s:0:"";s:7:"toolbar";s:4:"full";s:12:"media_upload";s:3:"yes";s:17:"conditional_logic";a:3:{s:6:"status";s:1:"0";s:5:"rules";a:1:{i:0;a:3:{s:5:"field";s:4:"null";s:8:"operator";s:2:"==";s:5:"value";s:0:"";}}s:8:"allorany";s:3:"all";}s:8:"order_no";i:0;}i:1;a:12:{s:3:"key";s:19:"field_53ce972fbdeb7";s:5:"label";s:8:"Settings";s:4:"name";s:8:"settings";s:4:"type";s:8:"checkbox";s:12:"instructions";s:0:"";s:8:"required";s:1:"0";s:12:"column_width";s:0:"";s:7:"choices";a:2:{s:13:"chose_parents";s:20:"Choose Parent Fields";s:9:"overwrite";s:31:"Overwrite existing Instructions";}s:13:"default_value";s:0:"";s:6:"layout";s:8:"vertical";s:17:"conditional_logic";a:3:{s:6:"status";s:1:"0";s:5:"rules";a:1:{i:0;a:3:{s:5:"field";s:4:"null";s:8:"operator";s:2:"==";s:5:"value";s:0:"";}}s:8:"allorany";s:3:"all";}s:8:"order_no";i:1;}i:2;a:15:{s:3:"key";s:19:"field_53ce815a63500";s:5:"label";s:10:"Field Name";s:4:"name";s:10:"field_name";s:4:"type";s:4:"text";s:12:"instructions";s:273:"

Enter the name or names of ACFs that you wish the above instruction text to appear on.

Multiple names must be separated by a comma.

They also must be the 'slug' like version of the ACF name. EG: they must have be lower-case letters with underscores

";s:8:"required";s:1:"0";s:12:"column_width";s:0:"";s:13:"default_value";s:0:"";s:11:"placeholder";s:0:"";s:7:"prepend";s:0:"";s:6:"append";s:0:"";s:10:"formatting";s:4:"html";s:9:"maxlength";s:0:"";s:17:"conditional_logic";a:3:{s:6:"status";s:1:"0";s:5:"rules";a:1:{i:0;a:3:{s:5:"field";s:4:"null";s:8:"operator";s:2:"==";s:5:"value";s:0:"";}}s:8:"allorany";s:3:"all";}s:8:"order_no";i:2;}i:3;a:15:{s:3:"key";s:19:"field_53ce816663501";s:5:"label";s:13:"Field Parents";s:4:"name";s:13:"field_parents";s:4:"type";s:4:"text";s:12:"instructions";s:317:"

Here you can specify if this instruction can only appear on a field with a certain parent field.

For instance this could be the name of a Flexible Content field or Repeater.

As with the field name above this can be multiple names separated by commas and must conform to the 'slug' like format
